title: Replace PWA app icons and in-app logo with newly generated school emblem assets

requirements.summary: Add newly generated, cleanly cropped square branding images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: New PNG assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
The generated icon versions are square, centered, and not visibly skewed; no black phone border/background is included.
The 192x192 and 512x512 icon variants include enough padding to look good as a maskable icon (no important details clipped by rounded masks).

file_operations.description: Create a cleanly cropped, square school logo image derived from the provided user photos, centered on the circular emblem with a small safe padding; background should be transparent or clean white.
Create a maskable-style square app icon derived from the provided user photos with centered emblem and safe padding suitable for rounded/maskable rendering; remove any phone/background borders.
Create a small square app icon derived from the provided user photos with centered emblem and safe padding; remove any phone/background borders.

requirements.summary: Update favicon and PWA manifest icon references to point to the newly generated app icon assets.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html <link rel='icon'>, shortcut icon, and apple-touch-icon point to the new icon asset filenames.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest icons[].src entries point to the new icon asset filenames and keep appropriate sizes/type/purpose.
After build, browser tab favicon and installed PWA icon use the new icon images (not the old v4 assets).

file_operations.description: Replace current favicon/shortcut/apple-touch-icon references from the v4 generated assets to the new generated icon files: frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_192x192.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_512x512.png.

Update manifest icons[].src values to point to the new generated icon files: frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_192x192.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v5.dim_512x512.png, preserving sizes/type and the any maskable purpose.

requirements.summary: Replace the in-app Header and Home hero logo images via the shared BRANDING.logoPath configuration only.
acceptanceCriteria: BRANDING.logoPath is updated to the new logo asset filename.
The Header logo and the Home hero logo display the new logo without layout breakage (maintain object-contain behavior).
No other non-selected images/icons are changed as part of this request.

file_operations.description: Update BRANDING.logoPath to reference the new generated logo asset file frontend/public/assets/generated/pkm-school-logo-2026-v3.dim_512x512.png so the Header and Home hero logo elements automatically render the new logo via BRANDING.logoPath.
